title: ‘35% Rider Error’: UCI Issues Intriguing Crash Statistics, Presses Pause on Gear Restrictions, Airbags
content:
The UCI and its safety group won't wage war on high-speed tech or restrict race radios just yet, but they're thinking about it.

Read the full article at ‘35% Rider Error’: UCI Issues Intriguing Crash Statistics, Presses Pause on Gear Restrictions, Airbags on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
